exprience.name: Solution Analysts Pvt Ltd
exprience.title: Technical Analysts
exprience.detail: Working in multiple projects and different domains like IoT, Industrial product, Music, E-Commerce, Music, Social, Education Game. Responsible to develop and analyze the technical feasibility of the project. Core responsibilities are Project estimation, Product architecture design, Code review, Exploring new technologies and SDKs, Creating reusable components, and App Automation. Also responsible for risk management and technical help.
achievements: Improve my skills in iOS, flutter, node js, angular
Learned about the different processes like code review, estimation creation, team collaboration, and training.

exprience.name: Indo-Sakura Software Japan 株式会社 (Tokyo)
exprience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
exprience.detail: Responsible to develop the music based Iot project. Which is connected to the iPhone device via Bluetooth. Many musical operations need to automate like composing and extracting multiple music files, adding musical effects, adding multiple instrument sounds. It was a very good learning experience in the music appplication.
achievements: Learned BLE IoT provisioning and communication with BLE device
